name: Berry
headline: Scale customer success and onboarding with AI
description:
Berry offers an AI CSM that scales customer success for SaaS companies.

Every post-sales organization faces the challenge of scaling customer success without having to hire more. Berry combines the best of the two worlds - taking the white-glove onboarding experience and offering it at scale. 

Our AI CSM onboards, trains and grows accounts for you non-stop. It’s a 10x hire to your team - at a fraction of the cost.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:generative-ai; industry:customer-success; industry:ai; industry:conversational-ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Yan Fu, Founder
founders.description: 15 years of experience in engineering leadership; a 3-time startup CTO; shipped Sony’s cloud products to hundreds of millions.

founders.name: Ann Chan, Founder
founders.description:
Ann Chan is the Co-founder & CPO of Berry. Prior to Berry, Ann drove Facebook’s user growth  and was one of the first PMs that helped launched Meta's first smart AR glasses. She previously co-founded a grocery e-commerce startup and started her career as a UX designer. 

Originally from Hong Kong, Ann studied Economics at University College London, before moving to the bay area.

# Scale Customer Success and Onboarding with AI
Our AI CSM onboards and trains customers on auto-pilot, reducing time to value and increasing account activation. It’s a 10x hire to your team - at a fraction of the cost.
Book a demo [Learn More](https://berryai.com/<#Feature>)
![](https://berryai.com/images/Hero-image.jpg)
## Post-sales organizations can scale success without hiring more 
Berry takes the white-glove onboarding experience and offers it at scale. Our AI CSM comes with superpowers to 10x the capacity of any human customer success managers.
![Icon](https://berryai.com/images/Icon_Company_Culture_1Icon_Company_Culture.png)
### Infinite Knowledge
It retains an unlimited memory of your entire product knowledge base and remains constantly updated - retraining only takes seconds, not days or weeks.
![](https://berryai.com/images/664238b270d73798b5b4e69f_Article_Ideas.png)
### Human-like Thinking
It knows how to guide customers in problem discovery and change management, even when customers struggle to articulate their needs effectively.
![](https://berryai.com/images/664238b270d73798b5b4e6a2_Paraphrase.png)
### Instant Strategy Adoption
Like a sponge, it absorbs any new CS strategy and implements it instantly. For example, it can pinpoint specific features to promote, driving adoption and enhancing retention.
![Icon](https://berryai.com/images/voice_chat_1voice_chat.png)
### Technical Expertise
It also excels as an engineer, providing support on code-related inquiries and complex logical reasoning.
![Icon](https://berryai.com/images/Icon_Flexible_Work_1Icon_Flexible_Work.png)
### Available 24/7
It never rests and serves as a reliable companion to every customer, offering assistance whenever they require it.
![Icon](https://berryai.com/images/Icon_Collabaration_Teamwork_1Icon_Collabaration_Teamwork.png)
### Co-pilot for CSM
Berry's AI CSM acts as a co-pilot to your human CSMs, assisting them in answering customer questions, creating success plans, and streamlining their workflow.
## Transform the customer journey with Berry AI
Imagine a fleet of AI assistants, providing white-glove onboarding, training, and support to service customers of all sizes. When operational-centric tasks are outsourced to AI, human CSMs will finally be freed to do what they do best — building human connections. 
[All Use Case](https://berryai.com/<use-case.html>)
![Icon](https://berryai.com/images/voice_chat_1voice_chat.png)
### Guided onboarding and Implementation
Berry Onboarding Widget accelerates time to value by proactively guiding users to implement and onboard with 1-on-1 personalization
![Icon](https://berryai.com/images/edit_note_1edit_note.png)
### Answer support questions
Berry Support Chat bot deflects tickets. Unblock users and empower them to self-serve whenever issues arise.
![](https://berryai.com/images/suggested-person---transition.png)
### Automate workflows
Berry Workflow automates high-frequency tasks. Go beyond Q&A and let the AI agents perform tasks for your customers.
![Icon](https://berryai.com/images/Icon_Impactfull_Work_1Icon_Impactfull_Work.png)
### Training and education
Berry LMS educates and trains customers. Provide effective training at scale with AI-instructor hand holding users
![Icon](https://berryai.com/images/Icon_Collabaration_Teamwork_1Icon_Collabaration_Teamwork.png)
### Internal Co-pilot
Berry Co-pilot boosts team productivity. Ramp your success and support team faster and empower them with expert knowledge.
## All in One AI Customer Success Platform
Berry provides a platform that helps Enterprise SaaS companies leverage AI in all post-sales touch points: onboarding, training, support, and change management.
![](https://berryai.com/images/664238b270d73798b5b4e641_64cdf448666ac6009c64893e_Salesforce.png)
![](https://berryai.com/images/HubSpot.png)
![](https://berryai.com/images/logo-servicenow.webp)
![](https://berryai.com/images/Zendesk-logo.png)
![](https://berryai.com/images/freshdesk.webp)
![](https://berryai.com/images/gainsight.ece53cde.svg)
![Icon](https://berryai.com/images/Atlassian.png)
![Icon](https://berryai.com/images/Slack.png)
### Integrations
We provide end-to-end integration into your existing GTM tech stack so you can leverage AI to enrich the customer journey while maximizing efficiency.
[View All](https://berryai.com/<integration.html>)
![](https://berryai.com/images/21972-312_SOC_NonCPA-1.png)
### Enterprise Ready
Berry is enterprise ready, with admin features & AI that meets security and data privacy standards.
[View All](https://berryai.com/<products.html>)
## FAQs

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Berry**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator’s W23 Batch, Berry is a San Francisco-based startup that's tackling a common hiccup in the SaaS world—the challenge of scaling customer success and onboarding. With a lean team of eight and guidance from notable partner Michael Seibel, Berry is carving out its niche in the bustling landscape of artificial intelligence.

**Mission Statement**

Berry's mission is clear: to scale customer success and onboarding through AI. The core offer revolves around its AI Customer Success Manager (CSM), which effectively acts as an additional team member—one that’s always available, continuously learning, and capable of handling multiple onboarding processes simultaneously.

**The Problem It Solves**

In the realm of post-sales organizations, growing customer success endeavors typically means hiring more staff. Berry shifts that paradigm by integrating a white-glove onboarding experience on a much larger scale. Their AI CSM automates the onboarding, training, and account growth processes, acting as a 10× hire without the hefty price tag that comes with human capital.

**Features & Capabilities**
- **Infinite Memory**: Retains extensive product knowledge, updating itself in seconds, ensuring it’s always at the top of its game.
- **Human-Like Thinking**: Navigates customer inquiries and problem-solving sessions seamlessly, even when customers can’t clearly articulate their needs.
- **Instant Strategy Implementation**: Quickly adopts new customer success strategies, pinpointing features to promote for higher user engagement.
- **24/7 Availability**: Unlike a human employee, Berry never sleeps, always available to assist customers when they need it.
- **Co-Pilot for Customer Success Managers**: Enhances human efforts by streamlining workflows and helping in customer interactions.

**Customer Journey Transformation**

Berry proposes a vision where a fleet of AI assistants, equipped with top-tier onboarding and training capabilities, can serve any customer—large or small. This allows human CSMs to focus on what they do best: building meaningful relationships, rather than getting bogged down by routine operational tasks.

**Integrations and Security**

Berry ensures compatibility with existing GTM tech stacks, including platforms like Salesforce, HubSpot, and Zendesk, allowing for seamless enrichment of the customer journey. Furthermore, with enterprise-ready features and a commitment to security and data privacy, it’s designed to align with the standards set by larger organizations.

**In Conclusion**

Berry is not just another AI tool; it’s a pivotal player aiming to revolutionize the way SaaS companies approach customer success and onboarding. Their approach marries cutting-edge technology with an empathetic understanding of what customer success means—helping companies do more, with less fuss. If you’re looking to level up your post-sales team, Berry might just be the AI partner you need. To explore more, check out their [website](https://berryai.com/).
